name: Change The Game - Jornada de Zigifrids
name_original: Change The Game - Jornada de Zigifrids
description:
Change The Game - Jornada de Zigifrids is a platformer game developed by Lia Fuziy. It was originally released in 2021.
You can play Change The Game - Jornada de Zigifrids on Web. The game is sold via itch.io.
